casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Christopher Dale RIDLEY. No. 272PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Scott Thomas, District Attorney, for State of NC. John T. Hall, Raleigh, for Christopher Dale Ridley.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attorney General on the 18th day of May 2006 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th day of June 2007."

HUDSON, J., recused.
